name: Lost in trees 2.0
description:
There are nothing but a gloomy dark ancient forest arisen straight from Slavic legends for miles around. Can you find a way out? What should you do if you’ve noticed that you’re going in circles? And who is staring at you from the shadows? Wander the paths of surrealistic forest and find out whether you can manage to avoid the fate of the disappeared there.

Project manager: Anna Bolshekova vk.com/machaonorientis

Game and narrative designer: Svyatoslav Zhilenko

Developer: Anna Bolshekova vk.com/machaonorientis

Artists: 

Anastasia Romanova vk.com/ka_missa

Vadim Zalepaev

Yuliya Leshchenko

Translators:

Svyatoslav Zhilenko

Alöna Sokolova
